products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout white roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy. products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This crisp white roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and fresh. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
